name: Love Dash
description:
Dodge spikes and saws, escape the scary monsters and... fall in love? The scary monsters may not be as scary as you think...

A side scrolling runner with a lighthearted story.

Made for Brackeys game jam over ~ 7 days. Theme: Love is blind

Made by Dave Allen. This is my first time doing a jam on my own - I had a lot of fun and learnt a lot in the process!

Controls

[Space] to jump.

Builds

For best results try the windows build. Audio can be a little iffy in the web build. The mac build is untested so no guarantees!
